summary: Tommy leaves his kittens out for Santa to take back to the North Pole, but after a major allergic reaction Santa can't deliver presents anymore, so the kittens have to deliver the rest of the presents to all the boys and girls.
cast: Ezra James Colbert|Nicola Lambo|John P. Fowler|Jordan Bielsky|Lauren Elizabeth Hood|Quinn Ljoka|Marguerite Gioia Insolia|Dylan Vox|James Kondelik|Evan Boymel|Peyton Shayler|Sandell Stangl|Erica Duke|Damoni Burkhardt|Meghan Maloof|Kaitlyn Maloof|Max Baroudi|Audrey Latt|Jamey Rimawi|Ashlie Aparicio|Addy Ray|Gia Albano|Aaron Witlin|Glenn Miller|Lawrence Elisalde
director: Director: Glenn Miller (as Glenn R. Miller)
title: Santa Claws
